text: Blood and Bone is the fifth fantasy novel by Canadian author Ian Cameron Esslemont set in the world of the Malazan Book of the Fallen, co-created with Esslemont's friend and colleague Steven Erikson. Blood and Bone is the fifth of six novels in Esslemont’s Novels of the Malazan Empire series. ==References== Category:2012 novels Category:High fantasy novels Category:Novels of the Malazan Empire
title: Blood and Bone (novel)
